official-title.#text:
To end unemployment payments to jobless
		  millionaires.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Ending Unemployment Payments to
			 Jobless Millionaires Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Ending
			 unemployment payments to jobless millionaires

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
and the emergency unemployment compensation
			 program under

) in a year
			 to an individual whose resources in the preceding year were equal to or greater
			 than $1,000,000. For purposes of the preceding sentence, with respect to a
			 year, an individual's resources shall be determined in the same manner as a
			 subsidy eligible individual’s resources are determined for the year under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: title IV of the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2008

text.#text:
Notwithstanding
			 any other provision of law, no Federal funds may be used to make payments of
			 unemployment compensation (including such compensation under the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 1860D–14(a)(3)(E) of the Social Security Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall apply to weeks of
			 unemployment beginning on or after the date of the enactment of this
			 Act.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Ending Unemployment Payments to Jobless Millionaires Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2448 IH: Ending Unemployment Payments to Jobless Millionaires Act of 2013
